body_html: I was reading the patch and I am not sure why it is this long (not saying it's wrong, but my priors were that this should be a shorter change). For example, where is the new unpack_type function being used? I don't see any call sites in the diff.

body: I was reading the patch and I am not sure why it is this long (not saying it's wrong, but my priors were that this should be a shorter change). For example, where is the new `unpack_type` function being used? I don't see any call sites in the diff.
